org.apache.beam.sdk.io

Class AvroSchemaIOProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.AvroSchemaIOProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchemaIOProvider
    Deprecated. 
    Avro related classes are deprecated in module beam-sdks-java-core and will be eventually removed. Please, migrate to a new module beam-sdks-java-extensions-avro by importing org.apache.beam.sdk.extensions.avro.io.AvroSchemaIOProvider instead of this one.

    @Internal
 @AutoService(value=SchemaIOProvider.class)
 @Deprecated
public class AvroSchemaIOProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements SchemaIOProvider
    An implementation of SchemaIOProvider for reading and writing Avro files with AvroIO.
